title: Fun with Paper
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 32 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile BR30L
description: So many projects use paper. In Fun with Paper, students will read about different things they can do with paper. The detailed, colorful photographs; high-frequency words; and repetitive sentence patterns will support early readers. The book can be also used to teach students how to identify the main idea and details, as well as how to locate and use verbs.
reviewWords: change, fold, glue, paper, tape, tear
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency words be, can, you
